creator: rainer.jung@kippdata.de
text:
LB worker attributes session_cookie, session_path, session_cookie_path and set_session_cookie are currently neither displayed by the status worker, nor are they manageable by it.

They could be added to the shm and the status worker. Not a high priority, because the need to manage them dynamicaly should be low.

Not planning to implement myself, patches are welcome.
